decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (24GF EX 01, 24GF EX 02, 24GF EX 04, 24GF EX 04, 24GF EX 05, 24GF EX 06, 24GF EX 07, 24GF EX S01, 24GF OS 01, Received: 27/06/2016, 24 AVRA GA 01 Rev A, 24 GA 01 Rev A, Received: 28/09/2016, 24 AVRA GA 02 Rev B, 24 AVRA GA 03 Rev B, 24 AVRA GA 04 Rev B, Received: 20/10/2016) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.

Condition : 4 - The windows of the side dormer hereby approved shall be fitted with obscure glazing to a height of 1.75m above the internal floor level of the room that it would serve, and the windows shall be top-hung or non-opening.
Condition : 5 - Notwithstanding the details shown on the approved plans, the window to be fitted on the front roof face of the dwelling shall be of traditional black conservation style.
description: Erection of side and rear roof extension incorporating one rooflight to front of house
